author: Special Correspondent
text:
An advocate’s clerk allegedly murdered his wife and minor son by reportedly setting them afire after pouring petrol over them and ended his life too by immolating himself. The incident took place in the house of the clerk, Subramani, at Vilanthai village near Andimadam in Ariyalur district in the early hours of Tuesday.

A domestic quarrel between the couple is believed to be the cause for their deaths. Police suspect that Subramani had an affair which became a cause for friction between him and his wife Nirmala Mary (40).

Nirmala was the second wife of Subramani. Subramani allegedly poured petrol over his wife and son Rohan (15) and set them afire. Later, he poured petrol over himself and committed self-immolation. Subramani died on the spot. His wife and son died at Jayamkondam GH and Thanjavur Medical College Hospital respectively.
title: Man ends life after burning his wife, son
